com.camerontec.catalys.core.marketstate

Class MarketMirrorPurger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.core.marketstate.MarketMirrorPurger
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RulesEngineRouteStorePurger

    public class MarketMirrorPurger
extends Object
    Responsible for purging closed records from the market mirror and the recovery log. If the mirror is an IMarketMirrorWithOrderArchive the archive (which consists of closed orders) is also cleared.

      • validateClearingCondition

        public static void validateClearingCondition(String clearingCondition)
        Validate clearing condition.
        Parameters:
        clearingCondition - clearing condition
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If clearing condition can not be parsed.

      • purgeRecoveryLog

        protected void purgeRecoveryLog()
        Called after closed items have been removed from the in memory MarketMirror. Thus any FIX messages that were purged then will be considered closed now as they're not in the in memory MarketMirror.

      • isNotInFixMarketMirror

        protected boolean isNotInFixMarketMirror(IFIXMessage fixMessage)
        Parameters:
        fixMessage - a FIX message
        Returns:
        true if the FIX message isn't in the mirror.
